Articles.Content:
Hello Kerbonauts,

I made my forum account a very long time ago, but for god knows why I never posted anything. Now, after 2 yearrs and a "your username already exists", I'm back here.

Even though I've been here for a long time, I'm still a bit of a noob when it comes to rockets. I hope I'll be able to learn some stuff and share some experiences in here.

Have a nice day!
Welcome back! I suggest checking out the Tutorial sectiton.

Welcome (back) to the forums!

As Taki117 mentioned, you may want to take a look at our Tutorials section. In particular, I maintain a small list called the Drawing Board, which is conveniently linked in my signature, specifically to help point users in the right direction for quality resources. Don't forget you can also ask in the Gameplay Questions forum if you still have specific issues that have you stuck.

Hope this helps!
Welcome back! You're way older to the game than me (.18 baby). You'll get back into it soon! <3

Welcome back to the forums! I hope you have a nice time here.

Good luck and happy flying!
